revision.text:
__NOTOC__ bool '''SetCVar''' (str ''cvar'', int ''value'');
== Usage ==
Sets the value of a particular [[CVARs|console variable]]. Only mod-created console variables defined through [[CVARINFO]] can be changed with this function, any built-in engine CVars cannot be.
=== Parameters ===
* ''cvar'': name of a console variable. * ''value'': value to apply to said console variable.
=== Return value ===
Returns {{const|false}} if cvar is invalid, or it is not writable. Returns {{const|true}} if the cvar is set successfully.
== Examples ==
{{noexamples}}
== See also == {{CVAR functions}}
[[category:ACS Level alteration functions]]
